## Touch.setClientFromTouch() function

Set an event's clientX and clientY from its first changed touch. Use this to make a touch event work in a mouse event handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setClientFromTouch(e: Event | PseudoEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event \| PseudoEvent | A touch event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
